English.Name: Hypnosis
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Afflicts the targeted enemy with a
[LS:13558]Sleep[LE] status condition. A Pokémon with
the [LS:13558]Sleep[LE] status is incapable of action.
